input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product keywords and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function)

Product keywords:
Wrench: 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8
1-phillips, 1-flat screwdriver
3.5 inches long / 89mm 
chain tool 
disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench
four spoke wrench sizes; 8mm and 10mm open wrench 
Specs: Weight: 168 grams; Length - 3.5 inches; Frame - 6061-T6 aluminum; Tools - 6051 high tensile steel.
input_text.Response A: The CRANKBROTHERs Crank Brothers Multi Bicycle Tool (17-Function) is a must-have for any cyclist. With 17 different tools, it has everything you need to fix your bike while on the go. The wrench sizes include 2mm, 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm, and 8mm. There's also a 1-Phillips and 1-flat screwdriver, as well as a chain tool and a disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench. With a weight of only 168 grams and a length of 3.5 inches, this tool is small enough to fit in your pocket or bag. Made of durable 6061-T6 aluminum and 6051 high tensile steel, it's sure to last you a long time.
input_text.Response B: The Crank Brothers Multi Tool is a must-have for any cyclist. It features 17 functions, including a chain tool, disc-brake-rotor-friendly Torx T-25 wrench, and a four spoke wrench size. The tool is made from high tensile steel and weighs only 168 grams. It's 3.5 inches long and has a frame made of 6061-T6 aluminum. It is a great value and a reliable tool for any cyclist.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
